name: Golduck
description: Often seen swimming elegantly by lake shores. It is often mistaken for the Japanese monster, Kappa.

abilities.name: Damp
abilities.effect: While this Pokémon is in battle, self destruct and explosion will fail and aftermath will not take effect.

abilities.name: Cloud Nine
abilities.effect: While this Pokémon is in battle, weather can still be in play, but will not have any of its effects.  This ability functions identically to air lock.

abilities.name: Swift Swim
abilities.effect: This Pokémon's Speed is doubled during rain.  This bonus does not count as a stat modifier.
abilities.description: Boosts the Pokémon's Speed in rain.
